title: 90 Grove Bay Petitions For Emergency Employee Support | Coronavirus Restaurant Impact
description: In this episode of The Barron Report, host Paul Barron chats with Ignacio Garcia-Menocal, co-founder and chief executive officer of Grove Bay Hospitality Group to discuss these unexpected shifts in operations and their focus on trying to provide assistance to their employees.
itunes:author: Foodable Network
